setup.welcome: Welcome to your first setup of wg-easy !

messageWelcome.whatIs: You have found the easiest way to install and manage WireGuard on any Linux host!
messageWelcome.warning: First of all, make sure you have a backup of your data if you want to migrate your users to your new wg-easy.
messageWelcome.next: Click on the arrow button to proceed to the next step.

setup.messageSetupLanguage: Please choose a language for the setup.
setup.messageSetupCreateAdminUser: Please first enter an admin username and a strong secure password. This information will be used to log in to your administration panel.
setup.messageSetupHostPort: Please enter the host and port information. This will be used for the client configuration when setting up WireGuard on their devices.
setup.messageSetupMigration: Please provide the backup file if you want to migrate your data from your previous wg-easy version to your new setup.
setup.messageSetupValidation: Welcome to wg-easy ! The easiest way to run WireGuard VPN and Web-based Admin UI.

client.id: Client ID must be a valid number
client.name: Name must be a valid string
client.nameMin: Name must be at least 1 Character
client.expireDate: expiredDate must be a valid string
client.expireDateMin: expiredDate must be at least 1 Character
client.address4: IPv4 Address must be a valid string
client.address4Min: IPv4 Address must be a be at least 1 Character
client.address6: IPv6 Address must be a valid string
client.address6Min: IPv6 Address must be a be at least 1 Character
client.serverAllowedIps: Allowed IPs must be a valid array of strings

user.username: Username must be a valid string
user.usernameMin: Username must be at least 8 Characters
user.password: Password must be a valid string
user.passwordMin: Password must be at least 12 Characters
user.passwordUppercase: Password must have at least 1 uppercase letter
user.passwordLowercase: Password must have at least 1 lowercase letter
user.passwordNumber: Password must have at least 1 number
user.passwordSpecial: Password must have at least 1 special character
user.remember: Remember must be a valid boolean

userConfig.host: Host must be a valid string
userConfig.hostMin: Host must contain at least 1 character

general.sessionTimeout: Session Timeout must be a valid number

interface.cidr: CIDR must be a valid string
interface.cidrMin: CIDR must be at least 1 Character
interface.device: Device must be a valid string
interface.deviceMin: Device must be at least 1 Character

otl.otl: oneTimeLink must be a valid string
otl.otlMin: oneTimeLink must be at least 1 Character

zod.body: Body must be a valid object
zod.hook: Hook must be a valid string
zod.mtu: MTU must be a valid number
zod.port: Port must be a valid number
zod.persistentKeepalive: Persistent Keepalive must be a valid number
zod.persistentKeepaliveMin: Persistent Keepalive must be at least 0
zod.persistentKeepaliveMax: Persistent Keepalive must be at most 65535
zod.address: IP Address must be a valid string
zod.addressMin: IP Address must be a be at least 1 Character
zod.dns: DNS must be a valid array of strings
zod.dnsMin: DNS must have at least 1 item
zod.allowedIps: Allowed IPs must be a valid array of strings
zod.allowedIpsMin: Allowed IPs must have at least 1 item

name: Name
deleteDialog1: Are you sure you want to delete
noPrivKey: This client has no known private key. Cannot create Configuration.
titleRememberMe: Stay logged after closing the browser
